response: The stones whisper no toboggan tournaments in Indio, North Dakota, but nearby Clarksville, Wyoming offers hiking gems worth your steps. Shall I continue the hunt there?

items.title: Red Fleet State Park
items.summary: Scenic hiking trails around a reservoir with striking red rock formations and frequent wildlife sightings.

items.title: Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area
items.summary: A vast recreation area with dramatic canyons and trails, beloved by hikers and explorers alike.
